lemma preservation_of_barbs_in_barbed_encoding: fixes Rel :: "(('procS, 'procT) Proc \<times> ('procS, 'procT) Proc) set" and P Q :: "('procS, 'procT) Proc" and a :: "'barbs" assumes preservation: "rel_preserves_barbs Rel (STCalWB SWB TWB)" and rel: "(P, Q) \<in> Rel" and barb: "P\<down>.a" shows "Q\<down>.a"
